problem.p: This is a concept question, provided to check your understanding of the previous video clip.
Check all the following which are true, regarding quantum operations:

choice.text: Unitary operations are an example of quantum operations.
Random substitution of a qubit by [mathjaxinline]|0\rangle \langle 0|[/mathjaxinline] can be described by a quantum operation.
Projective measurement of a quantum state can be represented by a quantum operation.
Measurement of two of the three qubits in a three-qubit state, can be represented by a quantum operation.
